author: Juan Meyer
description: Juan Meyer's original recipe calls for equal parts: Redemption rye whiskey, Suze, Amaro de Montenegro, and lemon juice. It's very tasty but I couldn't resist switching and blending whiskies and proportions. Both versions create a bittersweet, aperitif-style cocktail.
name: Day La Vie
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
20 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice)
